name: Ffestiniog Round Robin
description:
FFESTINIOG ROUND ROBIN One day circular journey in either direction from any station on the route Shrewsbury, Machynlleth, Porthmadog, Blaneau Ffestiniog, 
      Llandudno Junction, Chester, Wrexham, Shrewsbury and includes a single journey on the Ffestiniog Railway. It is also valid from Crewe either via Chester or Shrewsbury and also stations between Crewe and Shrewsbury, stations from Pwllheli to 
      Porthmadog or Minffordd, Aberystwyth to Machynlleth and Holyhead to Llandudno Junction. Separate fares are also available on the routes from Manchester, Warrington and Liverpool via Chester or Crewe and from Birmingham International, 
      Birmingham New Street, Wolverhampton and Stafford via Shrewsbury or Crewe to access the circular route returning to the origin station. Note that a return journey on the Ffestiniog Railway is not permitted.
